3: — Gray Raven and Changyu follow in Watanabe's footsteps to the Forsaken HQ, only to find the grounds crawling with the Corrupted.
What's that Corrupted doing there?
Commandant, they seem to be congregating of their own accord. Something's not right!
We cannot rush to conclusions yet, Liv. Can you determine what is going on in the center of the Corrupted swarm?
We could, but we run the risk of being discovered.
Liv nods and starts her analysis. The data she gathers shows a special entity in the midst of the congregated Corrupted forms.
Is that Corrupted making Zongs out of the supplies they stole?
Home... Kowloong... the taste of... home...
The Corrupted busy themselves with shoving rice and beans into the faceplate where their mouths used to be in an unsettling display of gluttony.
That Corrupted at the helm... could it be...
We have been spotted!
Affirmative! Focus fire on the Special Corrupted at the center! Lee, Liv, engage!
But the Corrupted are right between us and the target area...
We've come too far to give up now. Lee, Liv, engage!
The Corrupted surge in like a tidal wave, but Changyu is slow to react. Pensive and hesitant, he narrowly manages to beat the Corrupted in front of this back.
Akdelik kid! What are you daydreaming about, surrounded by enemies?
Appearing out of nowhere, Watanabe dispatches the Corrupted around him.
Old man? Why are you here...
Stop talking, and get moving. Forget about everything else. Focus on the fight.
...Roger!
Changyu shakes his head, as if to rid himself of extraneous thoughts, and rushes towards the Corrupted horde.
